step.cmd:
Select
File Import Design Studio - Import Screens.
step.stepresult: T24 screen import wizard is open.

step.cmd: Select the T24 server from the list and click Next.
step.stepresult: DS connects to the T24 server and retrieves all existing screens.

step.cmd: Select the screen(s) you want to import. For a global selection, click on the Select All button. You can filter the selection by: application, screen short name, module and component.
Click on Next and select the location where you want the screens to be imported.

taskbody.result: The selected files are imported in the chosen location. Importing large number of screens may take a long time.
taskbody.postreq: When screen is referenced by a newly imported one, an error is raised if the referenced screen is missing in your project. You need to import all referenced screens to solve this kind of problems.
